description_display: 2 drawings in pencil, the remainder in watercolor, various sizes. Mounted on card, two or three to a sheet. Manila envelope laid in, marked "Not for sale". Orange drop-back box, black cloth titling strip on spine.

notes_display: The note on manila envelope remarks "32 drawings by Pamela, done when she was from 7 to 9 years old, to illustrate her story, called The Adventures of Pinknose!! all about mice.
